I think i will retire in a few years.

participant_2.background:
I am a recovering alcoholic.
I take many medications and some of them make me see things.
I am a 45 year old male.
I now live in the city.
I grew up on a farm.

content.text: Hello, my name is [user 1]. How are you today?
I'm doing well, thank you for asking. How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thank you. I'm a librarian and I've visited Spain a few times.
I'm a recovering alcoholic and I'm 45 years old. I grew up on a farm and now I live in the city.
I'm glad to hear that you're a recovering alcoholic. I'm not familiar with farming, but I've heard it can be a difficult lifestyle.
It can be, but it was also very rewarding. I'm glad to be living in the city now, but I miss the fresh air and open space.
I understand. I've never lived on a farm, but I can imagine how it would be nice to have fresh air and open space.
It's something I'm still getting used to. I'm not sure if I'll ever be able to completely give up the farm life.
I'm sure you'll find a way to make it work. You seem like a very adaptable person.
Thank you. I'm trying to be. I'm not sure what the future holds, but I'm excited to find out.
I'm sure you'll do great things. You seem like a very strong and determined person.
Thank you. That means a lot to me.
You're welcome. I'm glad to have met you.
Me too. It was nice talking to you.
